item.title: Light pollution - flood lights, 13th February
item.description:
These lights are motion censored and shine in to 3 Glebe Road flats all hours of the evening, on and off every single time people and the overground go by. They arenâ€™t up to building standard and are a total nuisance. Hoping the council step in and help.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glebe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle parked, 13th February

item.title: Littering from neighbour., 13th February
item.description:
Well, the neighbour has been using the back of the window/corridor as their own personal trash can. As you can see from the pictures, anything and everything goes. Wipes, diapers, bottles, etc. ongoing issue for a year now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Howard Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
